schema.name: Three CheeseTuna Steak

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your grill or pan on medium-high heat.
Grate the mozzarella, Tillamook, and parmesan cheese. Set aside.
Season the sashimi tuna generously with ground black pepper.
Coat both sides of the tuna steak with virgin coconut oil.
Place the tuna steak on the grill or pan. Cook for 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or adjust the time depending on your preferred level of doneness.
In the last minute of cooking, evenly sprinkle the grated cheeses over the tuna steak, allowing them to melt.
Remove the tuna steak from the heat and let it rest for a couple of minutes.
Drizzle fresh squeezed lemon juice over the top before serving.

schema.description: This delightful Three Cheese Tuna Steak recipe is a perfect blend of high-protein and low-carb ingredients, designed for those looking to enjoy a healthy yet flavorful meal. With a mix of mozzarella, Tillamook, and parmesan cheese, complemented by the rich taste of sashimi tuna and seasoned with fresh lemon juice and black pepper, this dish is a testament to healthy eating without compromising on taste.
